BackstoryDef.title: Reformed Bandit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] failed as a bandit and was unfortunately captured by a colonial group. While serving a labor sentence, [PAWN_nameDef] realized how much better the life of these people had and decided to stay after being released from prison.

BackstoryDef.title: Retired Medic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a medic in the Armed Forces and retired from military life prematurely after a serious injury.

BackstoryDef.title: Correctional Officer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a security for guarding the bandits and raiders who were captured, Supervising them until they were free to go after serving their sentences.

BackstoryDef.title: Voluntary Militia
BackstoryDef.description: After seeing the astonishing extent of this planet, [PAWN_nameDef] became a Voluntary Militia Trooper in the Colonial Forces. [PAWN_nameDef] transfered to various colonial strongholds in need of bodies, and had to use whatever was on hand to protect them.

BackstoryDef.title: Reserve Colonist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the Colonist Physical Exam and only passed due to a clerical error. [PAWN_nameDef] has no special skills and followed the enlistment orders of the Colonial Fleet to receive simple training, enough to function as a substitute colonist. [PAWN_nameDef] was sent planetside to assist in the ongoing colonization work

BackstoryDef.title: Riot Suppression Specialist
BackstoryDef.description: Due to the chaotic distribution of the faction-controlled areas in most rim worlds, [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to accompany the special police tasked with using limited violence to uproot the countless bandit camps infesting the planet one by one.

BackstoryDef.title: Shuttle Pilot
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for flying a transport shuttle containing people and materials across a large sector of the planet. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to solve a lot of annoying mechanical and human problems along the way.

BackstoryDef.title: Armed Escort
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. To deal with the constant threats to their squad during the pioneering period, [PAWN_nameDef] used a healthy variety of firearms to kill anything that posed a threat to the colonists [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to protect.
